title: Recycle Track Systems acquires leading Canadian waste services provider RecycleSmart Solutions, Inc. - PR Newswire
summary: Recycle Track Systems (RTS) has acquired RecycleSmart Solutions, a Canadian provider of smart waste diversion and recycling management technology. The acquisition will expand RTS's product portfolio and geographic reach, providing customers with a wider range of waste and recycling management solutions. RecycleSmart's Pello waste sensor technology, an AI-powered device that detects and measures waste bin contents, is a key part of the acquisition.
